mapper.select: SELECT a.ID AS id, MAX(a.AUTH) AS auth, CASE WHEN isnull((select auth_level from sys_empref where id = a.id), 0) = 0 THEN '없음' WHEN isnull((select auth_level from sys_empref where id = a.id), 0) = 10 THEN '일반' WHEN isnull((select auth_level from sys_empref where id = a.id), 0) = 20 THEN 'IT관리자' WHEN isnull((select auth_level from sys_empref where id = a.id), 0) = 30 THEN '마스터' ELSE '일반' END as auth_level, MAX(ISNULL(b.NAME, '')) AS name, MAX(ISNULL(b.ROLL_PSTN_NM, '')) AS ROLL_PSTN_NM, MAX(ISNULL(b.DEPT_NM, '')) AS deptNm, MAX(ISNULL(b.CORP_NM, '')) AS corpNm FROM sys_menu_auth a LEFT OUTER JOIN [UNIERP_DB2_80].SPG.dbo.CRM_USER_MASTER b ON a.ID = b.USR_ID GROUP BY a.ID

SELECT ISNULL(a.ID, '') AS id, ISNULL(a.M_CODE, '') AS mCode, ISNULL(a.AUTH, '') AS auth FROM sys_menu_auth a LEFT OUTER JOIN [UNIERP_DB2_80].SPG.dbo.CRM_USER_MASTER b ON a.ID = b.USR_ID WHERE a.id = #{userId} AND a.auth = 31
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_menu_auth (ID, M_CODE, AUTH, INSERT_USER, INSERT_DT) VALUES (#{id}, #{menuCode}, #{auth}, #{insertUser}, GETDATE())
